arts.ttl: Oliver Burke's late heroics seal thrilling victory for Werder Bremen against resilient Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Jens Stage and Phil Harres trade goals before Oliver Burke seals the deal for Bremen for their first home victory of the season in what was an action-packed Bundesliga clash at the Weserstadion. Werder Bremen clinch a thrilling 2-1 victory over Holstein Kiel with Oliver Burke's late winner.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: BVB falter as Can sees red, another draw for Leverkusen, Burke lifts Werder late
arts.sum: There were plenty of intriguing results in the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs. Borussia Dortmund (another away loss) and Bayer 04 Leverkusen (another league draw) have both dropped points. Record champs Bayern, meanwhile, took care of business with another narrow 1-0 win. Bayern will enter the international break comfortably in first-place. The defending champs, meanwhile, are destined to finish fourth. Dortmund lie outside of Europe in seventh and might sink lower. An interesting match up north in the Weser Stadion saw Werder Bremen snatch a late win against Holstein Kiel. Unexpected Werder scoring threats Jens Stage and Oliver Burke both notched tallies, as did Kiel sensation Phil Harres.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Holstein Kiel preview: Grün-Weißen look to improve home record
arts.sum: Werder Bremen will aim to return to winning form in the Bundesliga as they face Holstein Kiel at Weserstadion on Saturday afternoon.
Week 10 of the Bundesliga promises to serve up plenty of entertainment and Tom McGarry has provided a score prediction for each of the nine games.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
